generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and traffic flowing in both directions.
- building: A white multi-story residential building is visible on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and some hedges are visible along the road and sidewalks.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including the vehicle from which the photo is taken and multiple other vehicles in traffic.
- bus: A white public transport bus is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including traffic light poles and streetlight poles.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the left side of the road.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible on poles along the road.
- terrain: A small patch of grass or terrain is visible on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
